info.en:
Location of Nodes
South Korea, Philippines

Server Configuration
Technical standards and total estimated hardware expenditure by the end of 3rd June, 2018:
*type: cloud（AWS）
*place: AWS region, Seoul
*machine: m4.2xlarge
* No. 1
*RAM: 32GB 
* CPU: vCPU 8core
*SSD 300GB 

The plan for expanding hardware capacity after 3rd June, 2018:
EOS NodeOne will adopt cloud and bare miners that are correspondent to the actual payload. The plan is as follows(one main miner, one backup): 
*Type: bare computer and cloud miner
* NO. 2
*RAM: 768GB 
* CPU: 2x3.4GHz 6128 6 core 12 thread processor 
*2x480GB STA SSD Intel S4

info.zh_CN:
节点位置
South Korea, Philippines
服务器配置
截至2018年6月3日的技术规格和资源总支出估算。
*类型：云（AWS）
*地点：首尔AWS地区
*机器：m4.2xlarge实例
* 1号
*内存：32GB 
* CPU：vCPU 8核心
*存储：SSD 300GB 
预计2018年6月3日之后的硬件扩展计划。
EOS NodeOne将采用与对应的实际有效载荷配置的云机和裸机，典型的扩展方案是（1主机，1备用）：
*类型：裸机和云
* 2号
*内存：768GB 
* CPU：2x3.4GHz 6128 6核12线程处理器
*存储：2x480GB STA SSD Intel S4
